mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_REPLY_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, REG_CUST_NO, REG_DT, REG_IP, USE_YN) VALUES (0, '#{boardTitle}','#{boardContents}', '#{regCustNo}', now(), '#{regIp}', 'Y');
mapper.select: select R1.* FROM( SELECT B.BOARD_NO as boardNo , B.BOARD_TITLE as boardTitle , B.REG_CUST_NO as regCustNo , IFNULL(FC.FAMILY_CUST_NICKNAME , SC.SC_CUST_NICK) as custNickname , IFNULL(SC_CUST_GUBUN, 'ON') AS custGubun , IFNULL(B.CHG_DT, B.REG_DT) as regDt , -1 as visit FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOM C ON C.CUST_NO = B.REG_CUST_NO AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN SOCIAL_CUSTOM SC ON SC.SC_CUST_NO = B.REG_CUST_NO AND SC.USE_YN ='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN FAMILY_CUSTOM FC ON FC.FAMILY_CUST_NO = C.FAMILY_CUST_NO AND FC.USE_YN ='Y' WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC ) R1 LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}
select COUNT(*) as listCnt from BOARD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO as boardNo , B.BOARD_TITLE as boardTitle , B.REG_CUST_NO as regCustNo , B.BOARD_CONTENTS as boardContents , IFNULL(FC.FAMILY_CUST_NICKNAME , SC.SC_CUST_NICK) as custNickname , IFNULL(SC_CUST_GUBUN, 'ON') AS custGubun , IFNULL(B.CHG_DT, B.REG_DT) as regDt , -1 as visit FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOM C ON C.CUST_NO = B.REG_CUST_NO AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN SOCIAL_CUSTOM SC ON SC.SC_CUST_NO = B.REG_CUST_NO AND SC.USE_YN ='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN FAMILY_CUSTOM FC ON FC.FAMILY_CUST_NO = C.FAMILY_CUST_NO AND FC.USE_YN ='Y' WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_NO = ${boardNo}
